typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		p_id as integer,
		price as integer,
		product as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		c_id as integer,
		p_id as integer,
		product as string,
		qty as integer,
		sale_id as integer,
		store as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document',
	systemColumns: false) ~> source2
source1, Select1 join(source1@p_id == Select1@p_id,
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
source2 select(mapColumn(
		p_id,
		product,
		qty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		p_id = {source1@p_id},
		price,
		product = {source1@product},
		p_id = {Select1@p_id},
		product = {Select1@product},
		qty
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 aggregate(groupBy(p_id,
		price,
		product),
	qty = sum(qty)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(total_sale = price*qty) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
